faq.question: What do we work on in sessions?
faq.answer: Psychoeducation about anxiety and post-accident stress, brief regulation techniques, route planning and rest routines.

faq.question: When should I seek help?
faq.answer: If you notice intense driving fear, startle responses, insomnia or repetitive thoughts for weeks, talking can help.

faq.question: Is care online?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer secure video sessions with sensitivity to your context.

emergencyNote: This service is not for emergencies. If there is immediate risk, use local resources in your country or city.
